title.@value: Substances associated with injury or harm in therapeutic use

definition.@value: Situations where a substance (drug or medicament) causes harm, in the context of intentional use for therapeutic purposes

label.@value: accidents in the technique of administration of drugs, medicaments and biological substances in medical and surgical procedures

codingNote.@value: Code first the injury or harm associated with the substance. Code also the mode or mechanism that explains the main way the cause leads to injury or harm.
